files.patch:
@@ -91,0 +91,1 @@
+    # Copy native static archive to module_static-libs for inclusion in jmod
@@ -102,0 +103,13 @@
+
+  # Copy hotspot libs, currently only libjvm.a
+  ifeq ($(MODULE), java.base)
+    HOTSPOT_LIB_FILES := $(filter %$(STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX), \
+          $(call FindFiles, $(HOTSPOT_OUTPUTDIR)/*/*/objs/static))
+    $(eval $(call SetupCopyFiles, COPY_HOTSPOT_STATIC_LIBS, \
+        FLATTEN := true, \
+        SRC := $(HOTSPOT_OUTPUTDIR), \
+        DEST := $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/modules_static-libs/$(MODULE), \
+        FILES := $(HOTSPOT_LIB_FILES), \
+    ))
+    DEPS += $(COPY_HOTSPOT_STATIC_LIBS)
+  endif
